title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from a table show different formats in a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
EB: The dynamic text item and the data/text item should display the datetime values in the same format.
SR: To reproduce the issue:  1. Input 'new Date()' as content for three items.  2. Save and preview the items.  Expected result: The dynamic text item, data item, and text item should all display the datetime values in the same format, which matches the input 'new Date()'.  Actual result: The data and text item display the datetime values correctly, but the dynamic text item shows a different format.
